channel.title: Comments on: The Carbon Is Going To KILL Us Just as surely as the knife at our heart or the gun at our head

item.title: By: car led bulb
item.dc:creator: car led bulb
item.description:
<strong>Stores market a 'green' Christmas...</strong>
Those trees will glow with Light-Emitting-Diodes -- or LEDs -- rather than the traditional bulbs of incandescent lights. Like driving...
item.content:encoded:
Stores market a ‘green’ Christmas…

Those trees will glow with Light-Emitting-Diodes — or LEDs — rather than the traditional bulbs of incandescent lights. Like driving…
